name: Dieter Hogrefe
content: Dieter Hogrefe - Georg-August-Universität Göttingen ✖ Suchbegriff Mit Google™ suchen Interne Suche nutzen (eingeschränkte Ergebnisqualität) Home Forschung Publikationen Kontakt Menü Menü Suchbegriff Suchbegriff Mit Google™ suchen Interne Suche nutzen (eingeschränkte Ergebnisqualität). Suche starten Mit der Nutzung der Google™ Suche stimmen Sie den Datenschutzbestimmungen von Google™ zu Auf der Suche nach Personen, Veranstaltungen oder Räumen ? Zum eCampus Schließen Dieter Hogrefe Prof. Dr. Dieter Hogrefe Goldschmidtstr. 737077 GöttingenTel. +49 551 39 172001Fax. +49 551 39 18172000hogrefe@informatik.uni-goettingen.de FORSCHUNGSSCHWERPUNKT Development of new communication protocols, in particular for the support of signalling services, that enhance security, quality and configurability of internet connections in general and in the mobile context in particular.Methodology for development of new protocols, in particular or specification, implementation and testing.Economic and legal issues arising from new and enhanced communication services over the internet, in particular in the mobile context CURRICULUM VITAE Dieter Hogrefe is full professor (C4) for Telematics at the University of Göttingen since 2002. He graduated at Philips Exeter Academy, USA, in 1976 and studied Computer Science and Mathematics at the University of Hannover, Germany, where he graduated with PhD in 1985. From 1983 to 1986 he was with the SIEMENS research center in Munich and worked in the area of analysis of telecommunication systems. He was responsible for the protocol simulation and analysis of the CCS No. 7. From 2003-2023 he was director of the Institute of Computer Science. From 1996 until 2010 Prof. Hogrefe was chairman of the Technical Committee Methods for Testing and Specification at the European Telecommunication Standards Institute, ETSI. From 2011 until 2013 he was dean of the faculty of mathematics and computer science. His research activities are directed towards Computer Networks and Communication Software Engineering. He published numerous papers and two books on Internet technology, security of wireless sensor networks, analysis, simulation and testing of formally specified communication systems. Prof. Hogrefe held full professor positions at the Universities of Bern, Lübeck, and Göttingen and visiting positions at University of Dortmund, Technical University Budapest, UC Berkeley and Hamilton University. Prof. Hogrefe has been retired since 2024 VERÖFFENTLICHUNGEN LbSP: Load-balanced Secure and Private Autonomous Electric Vehicle Charging Framework with Online Price Optimization Y Yuan, P Memarmoshrefi, T Baker, D Hogrefe - IEEE Internet of Things Journal, 2022 An AI-based Transmission Power-control Certificate Omission in Vehicular Ad-Hoc Networks Emmanuel Charleson Dapaah, Parisa Memarmoshrefi, Dieter Hogrefe. 13th EAI International Conference on Ad Hoc Networks (EAI ADHOCNETS 2021), December 2021, Online Conference.
